segments.text: Can I reserve a hotel room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I assure you , that's not a problem . What is your full name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a pleasure to assist you . Please tell me when you'll be needing the room , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If my plans don't change , I'll need a room April 14 till April 17 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , our room prices are slightly higher than you may have thought . Will that be okay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me how much it will be , and I can tell you if it's okay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Only $ 308 per night , before taxes , of course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: $ 308 a night ? That's a fair price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , as for the room , sir , do you prefer smoking or nonsmoking ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nonsmoking . Now , sir , does a single queen-size bed meet your approval ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have absolutely no problem with that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Queen , nonsmoking . Okay , sir , your room is reserved . Now if you'll just give me your phone number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not a problem . The number is 626-555-1739 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for making a reservation with us . We look forward to seeing you in April !
segments.speaker: S2
